player.dropzoneText: Drag and drop your audio file here, or click to select
player.dropzoneSubtitle: Supports MP3, WAV, FLAC, and other audio formats (max 100MB)

tooltips.bits: Controls the bit depth reduction. Lower values create more digital distortion.
tooltips.sampleRate: Controls the sample rate reduction. Lower values create more aliasing and digital artifacts.
tooltips.rate: Controls the speed of the modulation effect.
tooltips.depth: Controls the intensity of the modulation effect.
tooltips.feedback: Controls the amount of signal fed back into the effect.
tooltips.delay: Controls the delay time before the effect is applied.
tooltips.amount: Controls the intensity of the distortion effect.
tooltips.tone: Controls the frequency response of the effect.
tooltips.level: Controls the output level of the effect.
tooltips.gate: Controls the threshold for the fuzz effect.
tooltips.stages: Controls the number of phase shift stages.
tooltips.roomSize: Controls the size of the virtual room.
tooltips.damping: Controls the amount of high frequency damping.
tooltips.width: Controls the stereo width of the effect.
tooltips.intensity: Controls the strength of the muffle effect.
tooltips.threshold: Controls the input level at which compression begins.
tooltips.attack: Controls how quickly the compressor engages.
tooltips.release: Controls how quickly the compressor disengages.
